Body:
I have a realtime / iot use case for mobile that I would like to architect/model for offline database with synchronization mechanism.

I would like to know some thoughts on how to architect and model this. Here are some points ontop of my head.

  • first consideration, the database should be relatively small in size.
  • are there good opensource mechanism that can work for synchronization, particularly for data changes in the server and back online ?
  • how to do this in ios and android ?
  • how to synchronize say from a server postgres to sqlite on mobile if that is the recommendation
  • are there a good methodology approach

I want if possible something simple and doable.
